title: Kindred, the Eternal Hunters, available now

replies.body:
With the release of Kindred, riot has released 2 new awesome looking icons, but alas they have to be purchased with RP. I'm sure at one point Riot mentioned that we would be able to purchase icons with IP or earn them.

Fair enough team icons should be bought with RP seeing as you're actively supporting that singular team, but for stuff like this we should be able to get them with IP or get them if you meet certain conditions.

For instance if you purchase Kindred within the first week of release you should get the icons free, or if you buy the project skins first strike, you should of got the icon with those as well. Even if its something as simple as play the champion within the first week to unlock the potential to buy the icons with IP, it would make a load of people happier.

TLDR; Let us purchase icons with IP!

It's not like they're making much... It's less than $5 of RP

Edit: WOW I got misunderstood... I was agreeing as to this they are not sold with a very high price. Might as well make them able to buy with IP
Yeah, but just think $5 x10000+ people. its still a hell of a lot for something so minuet, but i suppose at the end of the day they are just an organisation, who still has pay its employees.

> minuet
{{champion:37}}
js3ude
I adore their game, I want to help them pay people to make more beautiful content. I'll be buying the lambs mask ^.^
Hey, care to throw some of that wealth my way? :( I'd love to have some RP to throw around.
lol are you giving me something? I'm supporting my game and getting something for it not just throwing money to random people who ain't doin shit for me.
SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY!
How very noble of you.

Their not an organization, their a company btw. Companies work for a profit, organizations do not necesarily work for a profit. 5X10000+ ppl plus everother skin, icon, ward, champion, and other merchandise real or not. So its not like their going broke or something.
it's minute as in {{champion:26}} {{champion:245}} , not minuet as in{{champion:37}} {{champion:432}}
Still though, It's not like skins or champions. It's just an icon that should have been able to purchase with IP....RIP wallet{{summoner:3}}
The icons aren't in the bundle either. so you'd have to buy them separately that way as well.
Nice Icon you have there. Where did you get it?

You get it by participating in the 'pick em' for worlds and correctly guessing which teams will win. You can still participate by going here [ http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#my-picks/bracket ], but hurry, as it locks tomorrow.
I$n't it weird how the in$eparable Kindred have $eparate icon$?
Can you just $hut up? Riot need$ thi$ money badly. It'$ not like they're for¢ing you to $pend your hard earned ca$h on the$e icon$. /$
Isn't it odd how people think Riot Employees work hard for free and doesn't have bills to pay. {{champion:8}}
I $ee what you did there.
We can have a demon Lambchop skin but we can't get an update on Japan server... I mean something about a cigar
Their log in music is beautiful.
Yes, I want to download it
go to your program files and you can find it there. make a copy of it and put in a different folder and you should have it for all eternity :c
I don't why, but it reminds me of a FABLE theme.
Am i the only person who digs the original skin more than the demonfire one? {{summoner:14}}
No I think the first one is cooler - that's how I felt about {{champion:432}}  as well. But yeah the original {{champion:203}} is better.
I like the original Lamb, but I like the way wolf looks with the Shadowfire skin better
I like the original skin better in all ways **except** the ultimate. Skin's ultimate is pretty nifty.
Good thing I have PBE....
My favorite part about all of this. Getting to shit on all of the plebs who have yet to figure out how to play them yet. Yay for PBE accounts.
Get the good behavior icon by being toxic. GG thanks Lyte.
how do you get a pbe account?

When you log into leagueoflegends.com, click the small arrow next to your name at the top right, click PBE and the rest with be simple from there. After you submit an app, Riot will need to see if they need more testers and see if you're worthy of PBE greatness. Few are chosen, all must live and die by the cause. (oh btw you sell your soul to get in.....or was that when you signed up for normal league?...)
Literally bought {{champion:122}} two days ago, have about 2000 IP, and only about 500 RP....... guess I'm gonna be spamming games to get enough IP for them now won't I? {{summoner:3}}
Does Darius ever make it past the banning stage?

Once he was on my team. Guess what happened.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.

We lost.
Thought he was bugged at one point. Never saw him in game.

i like the wording on these things ''_Hunt down more Kindred news here_'', ''_Emerge from the twilight with Shadowfire Kindred_'', ''_When the time comes, will you accept your end, or flee from it?_ '' i just enjoy these small things >.<
Just bought {{champion:150}} :( ..but kindred looks complicated anyway
Gnar is way better imo
Been stock-piling Ip for the past few months, I hope 25K Ip will be enough :D
Same xD
Same :D it irks me when people beg for champs or complain they don't have the IP...I've been saving for WEEKS.

It's actually a huge barrier to entry if you don't play 24/7 or come from pre-season one. I've been playing from the pre-season, and I still don't have them all (granted I'm easy to tilt so I won't play more than a game a day usually, and that's not even on every day)
Dmn you {{champion:268}} / runes damn you i totally should have been saving {{item:3070}}

I just bought Kindred with IP, I had about 15000 IPs initially but after the purchase, all of sudden all I've got left was less than 1000 IP. I think it costed twice as much it was supposed to. Anyone having the same issue?
yes I've had that problem with RP purchases. don't worry it should reset to the correct amount after you've played a game. kind of annoying but don't freak out about it.
lol yeah i had that with rp, but it went down to the negatives lol
yes I've had that problem with RP purchases. don't worry it should reset to the correct amount after you've played a game. kind of annoying but don't freak out about it.
